column5: 3 bedroom/2 bath cozy, comfortable home in established neighborhood with great indoor and outdoor space. Home entertainment speaker system with interior and exterior speakers. Covered back porch with ceiling fan, porch swing, and yard swing (for kids or adults). Great outdoor lighting for night time entertainment. Only 1.5 miles from Momentum Plaza (official game day shuttle stop) and 5.8 miles from Kyle Field!
column8: Cozy, Comfortable Home! Great for Aggie events
